api/collector.title: Collector API
api/collector.description: The Collector service provides REST APIs for retrieving metrics, events, and system monitoring data from all FLOPY-NET components.

api/collector-api.title: Collector API Reference
api/collector-api.description: The Collector API provides access to system metrics, monitoring data, and real-time performance information from all FLOPY-NET components.

api/dashboard-api.title: Dashboard API Reference
api/dashboard-api.description: The Dashboard API provides programmatic access to FLOPY-NET's web interface backend, enabling automation of experiment management, real-time monitoring, and system configuration.

api/fl-framework.title: FL Framework API
api/fl-framework.description: The FL Framework provides REST APIs for managing federated learning experiments, including client registration, training coordination, and model management.

api/networking-api.title: Networking API Reference
api/networking-api.description: The Networking API provides comprehensive network management capabilities through SDN controller integration, supporting both Ryu and ONOS controllers for dynamic traffic management, QoS enforcement, and network topology control.

api/overview.title: API Reference Overview
api/overview.description: FLOPY-NET provides REST APIs for its core components, enabling programmatic access to federated learning orchestration, network management, policy enforcement, and real-time monitoring.

api/policy-engine.title: Policy Engine API
api/policy-engine.description: The Policy Engine provides REST APIs for managing security policies, compliance monitoring, and governance rules within the FLOPY-NET system.

api/policy-engine-api.title: Policy Engine API Reference
api/policy-engine-api.description: The Policy Engine API provides policy management capabilities for federated learning governance, network control, and system compliance monitoring.

architecture/overview.title: System Overview
architecture/overview.description: FLOPY-NET is designed as a modular, policy-driven platform for studying federated learning in realistic network environments. This document provides a comprehensive overview of the system architecture, component interactions, and design principles.

components/collector.title: Collector Service
components/collector.description: The Collector service is the central metrics aggregation and monitoring system for FLOPY-NET. It gathers, stores, and provides real-time and historical data from all system components, enabling comprehensive observability and analysis of federated learning experiments and network operations.

components/dashboard.title: Dashboard Component
components/dashboard.description: The Dashboard is the central web-based interface for monitoring and controlling the FLOPY-NET system. It provides real-time visualization of federated learning training progress, network topology, system metrics, and policy compliance through a modern React-based frontend with a FastAPI backend.

components/dashboard_new.title: Dashboard Component
components/dashboard_new.description: The Dashboard is the central web-based interface for monitoring and controlling the FLOPY-NET system. It provides real-time visualization of federated learning training progress, network topology, system metrics, and policy compliance through a modern React-based frontend with a FastAPI backend.

components/fl-framework.title: FL Framework Component
components/fl-framework.description: The FL Framework is the core federated learning implementation that enables distributed machine learning across multiple clients while maintaining data privacy. It provides a scalable server-client architecture built with custom enhancements for network integration and policy compliance.

components/networking.title: Networking and SDN Integration
components/networking.description: The FLOPY-NET networking layer provides a comprehensive Software-Defined Network (SDN) infrastructure for realistic federated learning experimentation. It combines SDN controllers, OpenFlow switches, and GNS3 network simulation to create controlled, repeatable network environments that mirror real-world distributed learning scenarios.

components/policy-engine.title: Policy Engine
components/policy-engine.description: The Policy Engine is the heart of FLOPY-NET's security, governance, and compliance system. It enforces rules across all components, monitors compliance, detects anomalies, and ensures that federated learning operations adhere to defined policies.

components/scenarios.title: Scenarios and Experiments
components/scenarios.description: FLOPY-NET scenarios are comprehensive experiment definitions that combine federated learning configurations, network topologies, and dynamic conditions to create realistic and reproducible research environments. Scenarios enable systematic evaluation of FL algorithms under various network conditions and operational constraints.

development/contributing.title: Contributing Guidelines
development/contributing.description: Learn how to contribute to FLOPY-NET, including code standards, submission processes, and community guidelines.

development/setup.title: Development Setup
development/setup.description: Set up your development environment for contributing to FLOPY-NET, including local development, testing, and debugging configurations.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Get FLOPY-NET up and running on your system in just a few steps.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get hands-on with FLOPY-NET in under 10 minutes! This guide will walk you through running your first federated learning experiment with network simulation.

intro.title: Welcome to FLOPY-NET
intro.description: Observe, Control, and Understand Federated Learning in Realistic Networks

tutorials/advanced-configuration.title: Advanced Configuration
tutorials/advanced-configuration.description: Master advanced FLOPY-NET configuration techniques for complex federated learning experiments, including custom algorithms, advanced networking, and sophisticated policy management.

tutorials/basic-experiment.title: Basic Federated Learning Experiment
tutorials/basic-experiment.description: This tutorial walks you through running your first federated learning experiment with FLOPY-NET, from setup to analyzing results.

tutorials/custom-scenarios.title: Custom Scenarios
tutorials/custom-scenarios.description: Learn how to create and configure custom federated learning scenarios to test different network conditions, client behaviors, and system configurations.

user-guide/configuration.title: Configuration Guide
user-guide/configuration.description: FLOPY-NET uses a hierarchical configuration system that allows for flexible customization of all system components. This guide covers the configuration structure, files, and best practices.

user-guide/gns3-integration.title: GNS3 Integration
user-guide/gns3-integration.description: This guide covers integrating FLOPY-NET with GNS3 for realistic network simulation, enabling comprehensive testing of federated learning systems under various network conditions and topologies.

user-guide/monitoring.title: Monitoring and Troubleshooting
user-guide/monitoring.description: This guide provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities and troubleshooting procedures for FLOPY-NET experiments, helping you identify issues, optimize performance, and maintain system health.

user-guide/policy-management.title: Policy Management
user-guide/policy-management.description: This comprehensive guide covers creating, managing, and troubleshooting policies in FLOPY-NET's Policy Engine, enabling dynamic network behavior and adaptive federated learning orchestration.

user-guide/running-experiments.title: Running Experiments
user-guide/running-experiments.description: Learn how to set up, configure, and execute federated learning experiments in FLOPY-NET. This guide covers everything from basic experiments to advanced research scenarios.

user-guide/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Guide
user-guide/troubleshooting.description: This comprehensive troubleshooting guide helps you diagnose and resolve common issues in FLOPY-NET, covering system setup, experiment execution, network integration, and performance optimization.

user-guides/running-experiments.title: Running Experiments
user-guides/running-experiments.description: This guide walks you through setting up, running, and monitoring federated learning experiments in FLOPY-NET. You'll learn how to configure experiments, manage clients, and analyze results.
